pkg.Name: xyz class
pkg.Description: This Package Contains the demo lessons and NCERT questions solutions for science 10. You can learn the different topics and subtopics of every chapter of science 10 under this package.

pkg.Name: xyz class
pkg.Description: This Package Contains the demo lessons and NCERT questions solutions for maths 10. You can learn the different topics and subtopics of every chapter of maths 10 under this package.

pkg.Name: xyz class
pkg.Description: This Package Contains the demo multiple choice questions for science and maths of 10th class. This would help you test your concepts for these subjects.
